components/common/polyfill-script:
<script>
    {{!--
        Check for modern browser features, and load polyfills if browser does not appear to support features
        we need.

            Polyfill approach is all or nothing - please import needed polyfills in /assets/js/polyfills.js

        Inspired by https://philipwalton.com/articles/loading-polyfills-only-when-needed/
            --}}
    function browserSupportsAllFeatures() {
        return window.Promise
            && window.fetch
            && window.URL
            && window.URLSearchParams
            && window.WeakMap
            // object-fit support
            && ('objectFit' in document.documentElement.style);
    }

    function loadScript(src) {
        var js = document.createElement('script');
        js.src = src;
        js.onerror = function () {
            console.error('Failed to load polyfill script ' + src);
        };
        document.head.appendChild(js);
    }

    if (!browserSupportsAllFeatures()) {
        loadScript('{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.polyfills.js'}}');
    }
</script>

components/csd/head/custom-meta-tags:
<meta property="og:site_name" content="{{settings.store_name}}">
<meta name="twitter:site" content="{{settings.store_name}}">
{{#if page_type '===' 'default'}}
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary">
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta property="og:url" content="https://csd.shop/">
  <meta property="og:title" content="{{ head.title }}">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="{{ head.title }}">
  <meta property="og:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
  {{#if carousel}}
    {{#if (length carousel.slides) '>' 0}}
      {{#each (first carousel.slides 1)}}
        <meta property="og:image" content="{{getImage this.stencil_image 'carousel_first_slide_image_size'}}">
        <meta name="twitter:image" content="{{getImage this.stencil_image 'carousel_first_slide_image_size'}}">
      {{/each}}
    {{/if}}
  {{/if}}
{{else if page_type '===' 'category'}}
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary">
  <meta property="og:type" content="product.group">
  <meta property="og:url" content="{{> components/csd/head/canonical-url }}">
  <meta property="og:title" content="{{ category.name }}">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="{{ category.name }}">
  {{#if category.description}}
  <meta property="og:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
  {{/if}}
  {{#if category.image}}
  <meta property="og:image" content="{{getImage category.image 'product_size'}}">
  <meta name="twitter:image" content="{{getImage category.image 'product_size'}}">
  {{/if}}
{{else if page_type '===' 'brands'}}
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary">
  <meta property="og:title" content="Brands">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="Brands">
  <meta name="description" content="Browse through our selection of over 200 women's luxury designers. We carry the best of brands from Balmain and Christian Louboutin, to Isabel Marant and J Brand.">
  <meta property="og:description" content="Browse through our selection of over 200 women's luxury designers. We carry the best of brands from Balmain and Christian Louboutin, to Isabel Marant and J Brand.">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="Browse through our selection of over 200 women's luxury designers. We carry the best of brands from Balmain and Christian Louboutin, to Isabel Marant and J Brand.">
  <meta property="og:url" content="https://csd.shop/brands/">
{{else if page_type '===' 'brand'}}
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary">
  <meta property="og:url" content="{{> components/csd/head/canonical-url }}">
  <meta property="og:title" content="{{ brand.name }}">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="{{ brand.name }}">
  <meta property="og:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
  {{#if brand.image}}
  <meta property="og:image" content="{{getImage brand.image 'product_size'}}">
  <meta name="twitter:image" content="{{getImage brand.image 'product_size'}}">
  {{/if}}
{{else if page_type '===' 'product'}}
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="{{ product.name }}">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
  <meta name="twitter:image" content="{{getImage product.main_image 'product_size' (cdn theme_settings.default_image_product)}}">
{{else if page_type '===' 'blog'}}
{{else if page_type '===' 'blog_post'}}
{{else if page_type '===' 'page_contact_form'}}
{{else if page_type '===' 'page'}}
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary">
  <meta property="og:url" content="{{> components/csd/head/canonical-url }}">
  <meta property="og:title" content="{{ page.title }}">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="{{ page.title }}">
  <meta property="og:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="{{> components/csd/head/meta-tag name='description' }}">
{{else}}
{{/if}}
